Hey, so I am trying to use GRIP to detect objects through limelight. I was following these docs and when I try to click on the GRIP menu on my limelight window, it looks disabled. Does anyone know how to fix this? I attached an image below showing my issue.

Starlight220:

I recommend reading LL’s up-to-date online documentation rather than an outdated PDF.

That’s not an outdated PDF, that’s the same as LL’s online documentation. Compare the date to the last commit

The docs found on the Github are not the same as the ones on the Limelight website. The docs now use docusaurus instead of RTD, but only the source for the latter is on Github to my knowledge.

These are the docs right? I think this link and the pdf I was following are the same. I can’t find the docusaurus one though, can someone link me to it? Thanks!
